article_title: The Minimum Wage Debate Should Be About Poverty Not Jobs

article_metadata.description: If raising the minimum wage does little to reduce poverty, why are we arguing over its employment impact? As economic policy, an increase in the minimum wage fails on all fronts.
article_metadata.author: Jeffrey Dorfman
